Package coderunner

Class Task

java.lang.Object
coderunner.Task
public class Task extends Object
Represents a series of tests for a problem submission contains the source code file and a list of Tests
Version:
1.0 - May 28th 2023
Author:
Harry XU

  • Constructor Details

    • Task

      public Task(String sourceCode, String sourceFile, List<String> inputFiles, List<String> outputFiles, List<String> answerFiles) throws IOException
      Constructs a Task
      Parameters:
      sourceCode - the source code to be tested by this Task
      sourceFile - the path to the file to write the source code to for compilation
      inputFiles - a list of file paths to the input files for the tests
      outputFiles - a list of files paths to redirect output to for each test case
      answerFiles - a list of file paths to the output files for the tests
      Throws:
      IOException - if an IO error occurs while reading
      IllegalArgumentException - if the inputFiles and the answerFiles are not the same length

  • Method Details

    • write

      public void write() throws IOException
      write Opens and writes the source code to the specified source code file
      Throws:
      IOException - if an IO error occurs while writing to the file

    • compile

      public TaskResult compile() throws IOException, InterruptedException
      compile Reads and compiles the source code to a class file at the root of the project directory
      Returns:
      a TaskResult containing a TestCode and optional data
      Throws:
      IOException - if an IO error occurs while reading to the file
      InterruptedException - if the current thread is interrupted while waiting.

    • nextTest

      public TestResult nextTest()
      nextTest Runs the next set of test files on the compiled code
      Returns:
      the result of the test

    • hasNextTest

      public boolean hasNextTest()
      hasNextTest Checks if there is another test available to execute
      Returns:
      if there is another test to run

    • getTestResults

      public TestResult[] getTestResults()
      getTestResults Gets the cached test results
      Returns:
      the test results as an array

    • getCompilationResult

      public TaskResult getCompilationResult()
      getCompilationResult Gets the cached compilation result
      Returns:
      the compilation result
